@usedefault

@@title Recycle bin

{{binids}}

h1. Recycle Bin

{{actions:
- display: Destroy Cloudspace
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/destroy
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: CloudSpace name
    type: text
    name: name
    required: true
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True
- display: Restore Cloudspace
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/restore
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason

- display: Destroy Machine
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/destroy
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Machine name
    type: text
    name: name
    required: true
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True
- display: Restore Machine
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/restore
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason

- display: Destroy Cloudspaces
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/destroyCloudSpaces
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True
- display: Destroy Machines
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/destroyMachines
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True

- display: Destroy Disk
  action: /restmachine/cloudapi/disks/delete
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Name
    type: text
    name: name
    required: true
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True
- display: Restore Disk
  action: /restmachine/cloudapi/disks/restore
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason

- display: Destroy Image
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/image/delete
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Name
    type: text
    name: name
    required: true
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True
- display: Restore Image
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/image/restore
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason

- display: Destroy Account
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/delete
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Name
    type: text
    name: name
    required: true
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True
- display: Restore Account
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/restore
  hide: true
  refresh: true
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
}}


h2. Deleted Accounts
{{datatables_use}}

{{actions:
- display: Destroy all Accounts
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/account/deleteAccounts
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True
    accountIds: ${accountIds}

}}

{{accbin}}

h2. Deleted Cloud Spaces
{{datatables_use}}

{{actions:
- display: Destroy all Cloud Spaces
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/cloudspace/destroyCloudSpaces
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True
    cloudspaceIds: ${cloudspaceIds}

}}

{{csbin}}

h2. Deleted Virtual Machines
{{datatables_use}}

{{actions:
- display: Destroy all Machines
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/machine/destroyMachines
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    permanently: True
    machineIds: ${machineIds}
}}

{{vmbin}}

h2. Deleted disks
{{datatables_use}}

{{actions:
- display: Destroy all disks
  action: /restmachine/cloudapi/disks/deleteDisks
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    diskIds: ${BdiskIds}
}}

{{diskbin: type:B}}

h2. Deleted Images
{{datatables_use}}

{{actions:
- display: Destroy all images
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/image/deleteImages
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    imageIds: ${imageIds}
    permanently: True
}}

{{imagebin}}

h2. Deleted CD-ROM
{{datatables_use}}

{{actions:
- display: Destroy all CD-ROMS
  action: /restmachine/cloudapi/disks/deleteDisks
  input:
  - label: Reason
    type: text
    name: reason
  data:
    diskIds: ${CdiskIds}
}}

{{diskbin: type:C}}
